name: Treehouse - Dark Mode
description: Completely overhauls the Treehouse website to one that is easier on the eyes in low lighting. Even workspaces is altered.
additional_info:
v1.0.4: Fixed "Best Answer" box by darkening it.

v1.0.3: Darkened Workspaces loading screen. Removed some ugly borders.

v1.0.2: Fixed some white elements; darkened progress icons. Fixed colors in editor.

v1.0.1: Primary release with concatenated code. Working on other white elements for next release
